channel.title: Metanoia - Otherside
channel.description:
hey Guys :sunglasses: :sunglasses: :sunglasses: :sunglasses: just a little late to this forum :disappointed: ... didn't knew about it :roll_eyes: .. Started making tracks using this amazing app auxy i would like to make you listen to my track :sunglasses: METANOIA :sunglasses:
I make my tracks daily when i am travelling to office or to any client address (sales job :unamused:) My headsets are my speakers and train is what my studio is... Learnt from tutorials on youtube by @DJ_La_Rocca & @Produk
Guys please give your feedback's coz it will make me learn more.
![artworks-000374172672-q1c869-t500x500|500x500](upload://1hCxEapD7382D8TF0keC8S8Tx77.jpg) track link below https://soundcloud.com/sushant-ghanekar/metanoia

item.title: Metanoia - Otherside

item.description:
Pretty sure that bass thing is Wasp with Tone and Shape all the way up with a quarter delay and a bit of reverb

item.title: Metanoia - Otherside
item.dc:creator: otherside
item.description:
Hey thanks @DJ_La_Rocca this means a lot to me … Sure i will take those feedbacks and rework on my next track … Indulge
But i honestly thank you for giving such good tutorials on youtube it helped me a lot in making tracks (avicii levels tutorials helped me to make my own way of track to which you responded as well on youtube )
Keep doing the good work … Cheers

Read full topic

item.title: Metanoia - Otherside
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
Pretty cool intro there. How on earth did u make those weird bass reverb things? That hit every half bar?

Is this not supposed to be trance?

I suggest working better on transitions, and using a more powerful kick, structure the tracks better and create an layout. Buildup was pretty good. Transition into the drop was better than previous transitions, I’d still like to see tougher kicks in your drops to climax the listeners, but as u said, u don’t have headphones

Read full topic

My headsets are my speakers and train is what my studio is…
